verbs.description: Trump [V: has] blamed free trade for shipping too many jobs overseas . But manufacturing goods like iPhones and sneakers in the US would make them more expensive .
[ARG0: Trump] has [V: blamed] [ARG1: free trade] [ARG2: for shipping too many jobs overseas] . But manufacturing goods like iPhones and sneakers in the US would make them more expensive .
[ARG0: Trump] has blamed free trade for [V: shipping] [ARG1: too many jobs] [ARGM-LOC: overseas] . But manufacturing goods like iPhones and sneakers in the US would make them more expensive .
Trump has blamed free trade for shipping too many jobs overseas . But [V: manufacturing] [ARG1: goods like iPhones and sneakers] [ARGM-LOC: in the US] would make them more expensive .
Trump has blamed free trade for shipping too many jobs overseas . But manufacturing goods like iPhones and sneakers in the US [V: would] make them more expensive .
Trump has blamed free trade for shipping too many jobs overseas . But [ARG0: manufacturing goods like iPhones and sneakers in the US] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: make] [ARG1: them more expensive] .
